Package model

Interface Event

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractEvent, RecurringEvent, SingleEvent
public interface Event
Interface defining the behavior of an event. Provides methods to access event details and check for conflicts.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    conflictsWith(Event other)
    Determines if this event conflicts with another event.
    String
    getDescription()
    Returns the description of the event.
    LocalDateTime
    getEffectiveEndDateTime()
    Returns the effective end date and time of the event.
    String
    getLocation()
    Returns the location of the event.
    List<Event>
    getOccurrences()
    Returns a list of event occurrences.
    LocalDateTime
    getStartDateTime()
    Returns the start date and time of the event.
    String
    getSubject()
    Returns the subject of the event.
    boolean
    isAutoDecline()
    Indicates whether conflicting events should be auto-declined.
    boolean
    isPublic()
    Indicates whether the event is public.

  • Method Details

    • getSubject

      String getSubject()
      Returns the subject of the event.
      Returns:
      The event’s title or name

    • getStartDateTime

      LocalDateTime getStartDateTime()
      Returns the start date and time of the event.
      Returns:
      The date and time when the event begins

    • getDescription

      String getDescription()
      Returns the description of the event.
      Returns:
      A brief summary of the event

    • getLocation

      String getLocation()
      Returns the location of the event.
      Returns:
      The place where the event occurs

    • isPublic

      boolean isPublic()
      Indicates whether the event is public.
      Returns:
      True if the event is public, false if private

    • conflictsWith

      boolean conflictsWith(Event other)
      Determines if this event conflicts with another event.
      Parameters:
      other - The other event to check against
      Returns:
      True if there’s a conflict, false otherwise

    • getOccurrences

      List<Event> getOccurrences()
      Returns a list of event occurrences. For single events, this contains just the event itself; for recurring events, all instances.
      Returns:
      A list of event occurrences

    • isAutoDecline

      boolean isAutoDecline()
      Indicates whether conflicting events should be auto-declined.
      Returns:
      True if auto-decline is enabled, false otherwise

    • getEffectiveEndDateTime

      LocalDateTime getEffectiveEndDateTime()
      Returns the effective end date and time of the event.
      Returns:
      The end date-time, or a default if not explicitly set
